scripts.dev: npm run db:up && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace packages/api && npm run build --workspace packages/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace packages/api && npm run lint --workspace packages/web
scripts.prisma:push: npm exec --workspace packages/api prisma db push
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm exec --workspace packages/api prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:seed: npm exec --workspace packages/api prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:reset: npm exec --workspace packages/api prisma migrate reset --force
